solution_line_template: One liter of ketchup is made from {total_tomatoes_for_3_liters} kg / {liters_for_69_kg} liters = <<{total_tomatoes_for_3_liters}/{liters_for_69_kg}={tomatoes_per_liter}>>{tomatoes_per_liter} kg/liter of tomatoes.
Ashley needs {tomatoes_per_liter} kg/liter * {desired_liters} liters = <<{tomatoes_per_liter}*{desired_liters}={total_tomatoes_needed}>>{total_tomatoes_needed} kg of tomatoes.
